faq.ans: Any Indian citizen above 18 years. If you are under 18 then parental/guardian approval is needed.

faq.ques: How to make an account on Hipi App?
faq.ans: Download Hipi app from Play Store or App Store. Sign up by answering a few questions and you are good The contest period is for 6 months and 2 weeks to go.

faq.ques: Do you need to be a trained actor to participate?
faq.ans: No, not all. If you enjoy acting, you can participate.

faq.ques: Do I need to pay to download Hipi?
faq.ans: No, it’s free and easy to use.

faq.ques: Do I need to pay to participate in the contest?
faq.ans: No, it's free for all to participate. Just download the Hipi app, create an account & upload your creative lipsync videos!

faq.ques: Will I be paid to upload my lipsync videos?
faq.ans: No, you will not be paid. But you stand to win daily and monthly cash prizes, golden contracts and a grand final prize.

faq.ques: Can I submit videos in any language?
faq.ans: Yes, you can. We certainly do not want to miss out on talented creators because of language barriers.

faq.ques: How many videos can I upload in 1 day?
faq.ans: As many as you want but be sure to adhere to the rules of the challenge you are making video entries for, to increase your chances of winning. Use the monthly thematic challenge hashtag to participate.

faq.ques: What is the duration of videos to be submitted?
faq.ans: The video entries should not exceed 90 seconds.

faq.ques: Do I need to submit lipsync videos for songs or dialogues?
faq.ans: Your lipsync videos can either be set to songs or dialogues. But ensure that you follow the relevant theme and hashtag for the respective challenges.

faq.ques: How many videos do I need to upload to be eligible in the contest?
faq.ans: You need to upload a minimum of 1 video to be eligible for the contest as an entry to the respective hashtag challenge. But the more, the merrier!

faq.ques: Do we need to upload every day?
faq.ans: There is no compulsion as such. But more videos increase the chances of engagement and winning.

faq.ques: How will I get my cash prize and how long will it take to receive it?
faq.ans: Once the winner's name is announced, our team will get in touch with you and will take all your details to start the process. Once the process starts it may take about a month for the cash prize to reach you.

faq.ques: When will the winner of each hashtag challenge be announced?
faq.ans: At the end of every month, 1 monthly winner will be announced and will be 1 of 6 finalists eligible to participate in the grand finale.

faq.ques: Can I submit more than 1 entry?
faq.ans: We always welcome overachievers. You can submit more than 1 entry in any challenge and any theme.

faq.ques: Will this challenge be held in person?
faq.ans: This challenge will be held virtually for the foreseeable future.

faq.ques: Who can I reach out to if I have a question?
faq.ans: You can drop in your questions at Hipi Lipsync mail ID and we will get back to you.
